trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that defines a filter table entry element.
trans-unit.target: 表示組態項目，定義篩選資料表項目項目。

trans-unit.source: This element contains the association between filters, endpoints and backup endpoints and is used to determine which filter is used to route the message.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目包含篩選、 端點和備份端點之間的關聯，而且用來判斷哪一個篩選條件用來將訊息路由傳送。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Routing.Configuration.FilterTableEntryElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Routing.Configuration.FilterTableEntryElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies a reference to a backup endpoints element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定備份端點項目的參考。

trans-unit.source: A reference to a backup endpoints element.
Gets or sets a value that specifies a reference to a client endpoint that sends messages if the associated message filter matches the message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定傳送訊息，如果相關聯的訊息篩選符合訊息的用戶端端點的參考。

trans-unit.source: A key to a client endpoint.
Gets or sets a value that specifies a reference to the filter element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定篩選項目的參考。

trans-unit.source: A key to the filter element.
Gets or sets a value that specifies the priority of this entry.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定此項目的優先順序。

trans-unit.source: The entries in the filter table are evaluated based on priority, with 0 being the lowest priority.
trans-unit.target: 篩選資料表中的項目會根據優先權，其中 0 表示最低優先權進行評估。

trans-unit.source: All entries for a specific priority are evaluated simultaneously, if no matching entry is found for the current priority, the next priority level is evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 具有特定優先順序的所有項目會同時評估，如果沒有相符的項目位於目前的優先權，會評估下一個優先順序層級。
